verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fire and light is in the air
We have been taken up to Your glory place.
Angels and saints are here with us
We have been blinded by Your glorious light.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
We've been taken up, we've been taken up
To Your Holy Place, where Your glory dwells oh Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I'm breathing in the atmosphere of heaven
I'm breathing in the atmosphere of heaven
Fire and light
I'm living in the atmosphere of heaven
I'm living in the atmosphere of heaven
With angels and saints

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: We've been taken up, we've been taken up
